column5: My 12 year old tells the world that computers and technology can not replace the outdoors.  Help him spread his word of going fishing.   http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MAgiL-C-qos&hd=1

Have listened to it acouple times over the last few days! (posted couple days ago) That's just a fantastic thing to listen to and comprehend.. Incredible job, way to go. My 11 year old is going to listen to it today!  Thanks for this.
VERY well done!! A real piece of art.  when i read your thread title though, I thought you meant this:
That is freekin' AMAZING!  what a smart and talented kid!  :thumbsup_anim:  :thumbsup_anim:
that was very nice! Thanks for sharing that with us all!
Thanks very much... his voice really brought the poem to life.
